name: CNE: Certified Nurse Educator Exam Prep
description: Now updated to cover the CNE 2018 Test Blueprint! Prepare for the Certified Nurse Educator Exam through the NLN with nearly 350 questions from experts Ruth Wittmann-Price and Maryann Godshall.   Brought to you by Springer Publishing, this app also includes full digital access to Certified Nurse Educator (CNE) Review Manual 3rd edition, 100-question practice, custom quizzes, and more!  Install the free version today and jump start your studying!   We have provided a limited free version of the content that you can try before deciding to upgrade. This version includes a limited amount of practice questions and basic progress metrics.  Get your best value by upgrading to the Premium Version with a one time, in-app purchase. The Premium Version includes:   Full digital access to Certified Nurse Educator (CNE) Review Manual, Third Edition, by Ruth A. Wittmann-Price, Maryann Godshall, and Linda Wilson:  150+ practice questions covering more than 15 exam categories  Exam-style application-based and analysis questions with detailed explanations  Build your own quiz or study by topic - you choose!  A 100-question practice test with instant scoring and remediation upon completion  ALL book chapters including:   An overview of the exam  Key NLN blueprint topics such as:  Teaching and learning strategies  Facilitating learning in the classroom  Assessment Evaluation  Learning with simulation  Curriculum Design  Detailed results tracking for practice questions, with the ability to flag your weak areas for further review  Geared for nurse educators in the United States and Canada  And much more!   Springer Publishing  Please contact us if you have any questions, suggestions, or comments: medical@hltcorp.com or 319-246-5299.
